programme.title: Bob Dole to run for president
programme.short_synopsis: Bob Dole resigns from the Senate to run for president.
programme.medium_synopsis: With Bob Dole resigning from the Senate, Alistair Cooke examines the legislator's time as Senate leader and explores the uncertain future of the Republican Party.

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
